title: Compiler Panic

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Running cargo build failed on my futures repo at this commit/branch (causes-panic https://github.com/paulcavallaro/futures/tree/causes-panic): https://github.com/paulcavallaro/futures/commit/0f0fb2a157ef1612e6894752192e023629fada3f
## Meta

`rustc --version --verbose`:

```
➜  futures git:(master) ✗ rustc --version --verbose
rustc 1.10.0-nightly (62e2b2fb7 2016-05-06)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 62e2b2fb7acf5f8331781cd7128c754ed1b66c4f
commit-date: 2016-05-06
host: x86_64-apple-darwin
release: 1.10.0-nightly
```

Backtrace:

```
➜  futures git:(master) ✗ RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo build --verbose
       Fresh libc v0.2.11
   Compiling futures v0.1.0 (file:///Users/ptc/Projects/futures)
     Running `rustc src/lib.rs --crate-name futures --crate-type lib -g --out-dir /Users/ptc/Projects/futures/target/debug --emit=dep-info,link -L dependency=/Users/ptc/Projects/futures/target/debug -L dependency=/Users/ptc/Projects/futures/target/debug/deps --extern libc=/Users/ptc/Projects/futures/target/debug/deps/liblibc-6b483f9a7097e9a4.rlib`
src/future.rs:105:3: 105:3 error: this file contains an un-closed delimiter
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no annotations resulted from: Line { line_index: 104, annotations: [Annotation { start_col: 2, end_col: 2, is_primary: true, label: None }] }', ../src/libsyntax/errors/snippet/mod.rs:495
stack backtrace:
   1:        0x10f8918a8 - std::sys::backtrace::tracing::imp::write::h9fb600083204ae7f
   2:        0x10f89ddc5 - std::panicking::default_hook::_$u7b$$u7b$closure$u7d$$u7d$::hca543c34f11229ac
   3:        0x10f89d8ff - std::panicking::default_hook::hc2c969e7453d080c
   4:        0x10f862d56 - std::sys_common::unwind::begin_unwind_inner::h30e12d15ce2b2e25

   6:        0x10ca4ee51 - _<std..iter..FlatMap<I, U, F> as std..iter..Iterator>::next::h5f2bd9e6e7475c71
   7:        0x10ca38892 - syntax::errors::snippet::SnippetData::render_lines::hcf468c4f4b065b33
   8:        0x10ca31174 - _<errors..emitter..EmitterWriter as errors..emitter..CoreEmitter>::emit_message::h90dab4fc68091626
   9:        0x10c021db7 - _<T as syntax..errors..emitter..Emitter>::emit_struct::h7b7bf4316e311f87
  10:        0x10cb108ff - syntax::parse::parser::Parser::parse_token_tree::hd7887691a0224788
  11:        0x10cb00235 - syntax::parse::parser::Parser::parse_all_token_trees::hd7d5e9405b2cb448

error: Could not compile `futures`.

Caused by:
  Process didn't exit successfully: `rustc src/lib.rs --crate-name futures --crate-type lib -g --out-dir /Users/ptc/Projects/futures/target/debug --emit=dep-info,link -L dependency=/Users/ptc/Projects/futures/target/debug -L dependency=/Users/ptc/Projects/futures/target/debug/deps --extern libc=/Users/ptc/Projects/futures/target/debug/deps/liblibc-6b483f9a7097e9a4.rlib` (exit code: 101)
➜  futures git:(master) ✗
```
